code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import noteContext from"../context/notes/noteContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddNote=()=>{const context=useContext(noteContext);const{addNote}=context;const[note,setNote]=useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""});const handleClick=e=>{e.preventDefault();addNote(note.title,note.description,note.tag);setNote({title:"",description:"",tag:""});};const onchange=e=>{setNote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container my-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add a Note"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"my-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"title",className:"form-label",children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",name:"title",value:note.title,required:true,minLength:2,id:"title","aria-describedby":"emailHelp",onChange:onchange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"description",className:"form-label",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"description",value:note.description,required:true,minLength:2,name:"description",onChange:onchange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"tag",className:"form-label",children:"Tag"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",minLength:2,required:true,className:"form-control",value:note.tag,id:"tag",name:"tag",onChange:onchange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:note.title.length<2||note.description.length<2||note.tag.length<2,type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleClick,children:"Add Note"})]})]})});};export default AddNote;
